team.floracore.common.sender

类 SenderFactory<P extends FloraCorePlugin,T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • team.floracore.common.sender.SenderFactory<P,T>
  • 类型参数:
    P - the plugin type
    T - the command sender type
    所有已实现的接口:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable
    直接已知子类:
    BukkitSenderFactory, BungeeSenderFactory

    public abstract class SenderFactory<P extends FloraCorePlugin,T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Factory class to make a thread-safe sender instance
